channel.title: Locust on DevJoyOps
channel.description: Recent content in Locust on DevJoyOps

item.title: Fooling around with Locust
item.description: I am considering replacing Gatling with Locust for load tests. The only reason (for now) is that it’s a Python-based tool, since right now Gatling is the only one in my current stack where I’m using Scala, and I’d like to simplify it (and have the possibility for more people to a team can start writing tests). According to Locust website: https://docs.locust.io/en/stable/what-is-locust.html What is Locust? Locust is an open source performance/load testing tool for HTTP and other protocols.
